title: Hiroyuki Takahashi (footballer)
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Takahashi was born in <a href="Chiba%20Prefecture">Chiba Prefecture</a> on May 6, 1983. After graduating from high school, he joined <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a> club <a href="Tokyo%20Verdy">Tokyo Verdy</a> in 2002. On November 17, he debuted as substitute midfielder rom the 57th minutes against <a href="Kashiwa%20Reysol">Kashiwa Reysol</a>. However he could not play at all in the match in 2003 and retired end of 2003 season.
